description.general: A secure and modern workspace for health information management. Doctors optimize their practice while patients take control of their history.
description.patient: View your diagnoses from all your doctors in one secure place. Simple filters and clear history.
description.doctor: Manage patients and diagnoses in a clean, secure dashboard. Fast search, quick edits, clear history.

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.intro: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link.
forgot.codeIntro: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your email.
forgot.sentTitle2: you will receive a code to reset your password shortly.

verify.title: Verify your email
verify.intro: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your email.

eligibility.title: Access restricted to healthcare domains
eligibility.p1: To use this system, sign up or sign in with your work email from an allowed healthcare domain, or with an approved email address.
eligibility.p2: If your organization should be allowed, please contact support to add your domain.

chooseRole.title: Choose your role
chooseRole.doctorNotAllowed: Your email/domain is not authorized for Doctor accounts.

profile.title: Profile
profile.dangerPatient: Deleting your account will remove your profile and access to your records in this app. Records created by your doctors are not deleted, but you will no longer be able to view them here.
profile.dangerDoctor: Deleting your account will permanently remove your profile and all records you created (patients and diagnoses).

toasts.forgotSent: If the email exists, we sent a reset link
toasts.rateLimitedShort: Too many requests. Try again later.
toasts.rateLimitedWithTime: Too many requests. Try again in
toasts.useGoogle: This account uses Google. Sign in with Google.
toasts.usePassword: This account was created with a password. Sign in with email and password.
toasts.googleMismatch: This email is linked to a different Google account. Use the original method.

empty.title: No patients yet
empty.description: Start by creating your first patient to manage records and diagnoses.

list.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email or phone...

noMatch.title: No matching patients
noMatch.description: Try adjusting your search, age category, blood type, gender or donor filters.

card.confirmDelete: Delete this patient? This cannot be undone.

create.title: Create Patient
create.phoneInvalidAdult: Phone must have exactly 10 digits (area + number), excluding country code.
create.phoneInvalidMinor: Phone must be 10 digits or empty for minors.
create.diseasesRequired: Please enter at least one disease or select 'No'.
create.allergiesRequired: Please enter at least one allergy or select 'No'.
create.medicationsRequired: Please enter at least one medication or select 'No'.

edit.title: Edit Patient
edit.notFoundText: It may have been deleted or you don’t have access.
edit.heightWeightPositive: Height and weight must be greater than 0.
edit.causeRequired: Please enter a cause of death.
edit.emailImmutable: The email cannot be modified once registered.

detail.notFoundText: It may have been deleted or you don’t have access.

toasts.approveHealthInfoSuccess: Your information was applied to all your doctors.
toasts.conflictPendingPortal: This patient has a pending profile in the portal. Please resolve it first.

noMatch.title: No matching diagnoses
noMatch.description: Try adjusting your search or date and treatment filters.

empty.title: No diagnoses yet
empty.description: Create the first diagnosis for this patient to start their history.

card.confirmDelete: Delete this diagnosis? This cannot be undone.

errors.medsRequired: Please enter at least one medicine or select 'No'.
errors.txRequired: Please enter at least one treatment or select 'No'.
errors.opsRequired: Please enter at least one operation or select 'No'.

list.searchPlaceholder: Search by diagnosis name, doctor name or email...

empty.title: No health records yet
empty.description: When your doctors register diagnoses, they will appear here.

error.title: We couldn't load your data.
error.description: Please try again in a moment. If the problem continues, contact your doctor.

empty.description: None of your doctors have registered a personal profile for you yet. Once a doctor creates or updates your information, you'll be able to review and approve it here.

header.description: This is how your doctors have registered your personal information.
header.allUpToDate: All your information is up to date. There is nothing pending to approve.

multiDoctor.title: You've visited more than one doctor.
multiDoctor.body: If different doctors recorded different details (age, phone, countries, allergies, etc.), we show a combined view here. When you approve, the selected version will be applied to all your doctors. If something looks wrong, reject this version and we will keep your previous information.

basic.title: Basic information
basic.description: Name, age, contact details and donation preferences.

anthropometrics.title: Height, weight & BMI
anthropometrics.description: Only the most recent values are shown. Approving will apply these values to all your doctors.

conditions.title: Conditions & allergies
conditions.description: We show your most recent doctor's version. If there are differences between doctors, we also show what they agreed on before and any extra items.

medications.title: Medications
medications.description: These are the medications that appear in your doctors' records.

conflicts.differentField: Different doctors recorded different {{field}}. This is the version you are about to keep.
conflicts.newInLatest: New in your most recent doctor's version:
conflicts.othersStillPresentDiseases: Other diseases still present in some doctors' records:
conflicts.othersStillPresentAllergies: Other allergies still present in some doctors' records:
conflicts.othersStillPresentMedications: Other medications still present in some doctors' records:
conflicts.diseasesWarning: Different doctors have registered different diseases. If you approve, only the first list will be kept.
conflicts.allergiesWarning: Different doctors have registered different allergies. If you approve, only the first list will be kept.
conflicts.medicationsWarning: Different doctors have registered different medications. If you approve, only the first list will be kept.

actions.approveIntro: If everything on this page looks correct, approve this version so all your doctors use the same information. If something is wrong, reject it and we will keep your previous data.
actions.approve: Approve and share with all doctors
